alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Watch issued January 13 at 3:58AM EST until January 15 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING THROUGH SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing drizzle with a light coating of ice accumulation. For the Wind Chill Watch, dangerously cold wind chills possible. Wind chills colder than 30 below zero possible. * WHERE...Jefferson and Lewis counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM EST this morning. For the Wind Chill Watch, from Friday evening through early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Untreated roads, parking lots, and sidewalks will be extremely slippery this morning. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Periods of snow will result in snow covered roads and limited visibilities. Slow down and use caution while driving. Submit snow reports through our website or social media. This is a potentially dangerous situation to be outdoors. If you must be outside, be sure to cover all exposed skin. Frostbite can occur in 15 minutes or less with apparent temperatures of 25 below zero or colder.
